definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to degrade/to degenerate/to become depraved/corrupt/a fall from grace
to abandon oneself (idiom)/to let oneself go
as if lost in a thick fog (idiom)/in a fog/muddled/completely unfamiliar with sth
pinyin: ru2 duo4 wu3 li3 wu4 zhong1

definition: lit. to become lost in a fog (idiom); fig. at a complete loss
as if degenerating into smoke (idiom); ignorant and unable to see where things are heading

sentences.english: For some ten days , my heart suddenly perceived that its person was unapt to degenerate yet .
sentences.chinese: 有這麼十餘天來，我心中忽覺到了自己的不至腐墮。

sentences.english: Beware that wealth rarely lasts and power often corrupts.
sentences.chinese: 警惕富貴不出三代，小心權勢令人墮落。

sentences.english: Consequently can break settle, her Duo dead height, above at least in the 6 F.
sentences.chinese: 因此可以斷定，她的墮死高度，至少在六層以上。

sentences.english: The Leaves of Life keeps falling one by one.
sentences.chinese: 生命的綠葉葉葉地飄墮不停。

sentences.english: And when the tail led, the snake fell into a burning pit and was burnt to its death.
sentences.chinese: 放尾在前，即墮火坑，燒爛而死。

sentences.english: I dream of a fall in the wake of this stubborn.
sentences.chinese: 我在這場夢中一墮不醒執迷不悟。

sentences.english: No matter how I regretted, I still couldn't change the rotten body in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 再怎麼懊悔也無法改變，墮於黑暗中的朽蝕身軀。

definition: to sink (into ruin, oblivion)/to be reduced to
to cheat/to swindle/to pretend/to feign/to draw sb out/to try to extract information by deceit or bluff
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
